snippet: A week after a big investment by Pearson, Barnes & Noble says that revenue for its Nook unit - including e-readers, digital content and accessories - fell 12.6 percent, to $311 million, during the holiday shopping season.
abstract: A week after a big investment by Pearson, Barnes & Noble says that revenue for its Nook unit - including e-readers, digital content and accessories - fell 12.6 percent, to $311 million, during the holiday shopping season.

headline.main: Barnes & Noble Reports Decline in Nook Sales
